effect.scarlet_violet: Steals the target’s stat increases, then inflicts regular damage. Will not steal stat increases that would put any of the user’s stats at more than +6; any excess is left on the target. Stolen increases are affected by abilities as normal.
effect.the_teal_mask: Steals the target’s stat increases, then inflicts regular damage. Will not steal stat increases that would put any of the user’s stats at more than +6; any excess is left on the target. Stolen increases are affected by abilities as normal.
effect.the_indigo_disk: Steals the target’s stat increases, then inflicts regular damage. Will not steal stat increases that would put any of the user’s stats at more than +6; any excess is left on the target. Stolen increases are affected by abilities as normal.

short_effect.scarlet_violet: Steals the target’s stat increases, then inflicts damage.
short_effect.the_teal_mask: Steals the target’s stat increases, then inflicts damage.
